name: 7Night
lyric:
词:朱婧汐
曲:朱婧汐

混音:Cary Singer
母带:Riley Knapp
录音棚:声巧明录音棚
母带整理:李越@野火春风
Executive Producer:三少/朱婧汐/左惠夫

Hi
I'm not gonna tell you
And every morning I
Boot up but the same
Lying incomplete
Losing track of time
Thinking's everything
I know
抓得住的都不长久
欲望倒着行走
也走不到故事的开头
But days
Without those tiny faces
Useless pain in the black hole
Feel so stretched further than a life
Than a life than a life than a life
Than a life than a life than a life
迷路的蝴蝶在地铁里飞行
我努力揣测着上帝的心意
快断电的霓虹向倒影呼喊着救命
天使和魔鬼微笑着坐在一起
在日出前讨论着分成比例
谁挥霍着人生赌了一把之后
还以为得到和失去只是随机
This world is always ridiculous but real
Resident evil
Innocent People
When one become each other's illusion
The best ending for us
Disillusion
That's a life
That's my life than a life than a life
lyric_extra: LRC歌词最后由 Fayemil 编辑于2020-11-18 22:42

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 你想要与众不同，那你就相...
